mapper.sql: lesson.*, f1.file_url as video_url, f2.file_url as file_url from lesson left join file f1 on lesson.lesson_video_id = f1.file_id left join file f2 on lesson.lesson_file_id = f2.file_id
mapper.insert: insert into lesson (lesson_num, lesson_title, lesson_intro, lesson_chapter_num, lesson_chapter_title, note, lesson_course_id, lesson_teacher_id, lesson_update_date) VALUES (#{num}, #{title}, #{intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chapterNum}, #{chapterTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, NOW())
mapper.update: update lesson set lesson_num = #{num}, lesson_title = #{title}, lesson_intro = #{intro, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lesson_chapter_num = #{chapterNum}, lesson_chapter_title = #{chapterTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lesson_course_id = #{courseId}, lesson_update_date = NOW() where lesson_id = #{lessonId} and lesson_teacher_id = #{teacherId}
